Text: FTB launchercracked version 1.2.2. Launched for downloading. play. PURPOSE grab it??

Maybe dumb question but can someone explain to me: (1) why load this file, when you anyhow need the FTB-Launcher with wich you can also simply download it directly? (2) why the hell is the .zip ~100MB when the unpacked folder downloaded via the launcher is only half that big?
Okay... the answer to (2) is: Cause the download contain some additional sound- & music-files.

My friend was having issues updating, he has a legit Minecraft account but when he tried to update it crashed the FTB launcher. So in an effort to finally get him back on my server, I uploaded the full Direwolf20 folder onto here because the file was too big for me to email it to him. :P
